resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108750</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108750</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206349</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">1492: An Ongoing Voyage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">1492: Eine Fortwährende Reise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">1492 : Un Voyage Continu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">1492: Uma Viagem Ongoing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">1492: Un Viaggio Continuo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">1492: Ένα τρέχον ταξίδι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">1492: Un Viaje En curso</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines the rich mix of societies coexisting in the New World before Europeans arrived. It looks at what was life like here before 1492; how Europeans, Africans, and Americans reacted to each other; and the immediate results of their contact.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft die reiche Mischung der 
Gesellschaften, die in der neuen Welt vor Europäern koexistieren, 
ankam. Wie sie betrachtet, was das Leben hier vor 1492 war; 
wie Europäer, Afrikaner und Amerikaner miteinander reagierten; 
und die sofortigen Resultate ihres Kontaktes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine le mélange riche des sociétés 
coexistant dans le nouveau monde avant Européens est arrivé. 
Il regarde à quoi ressemblait la vie ici avant 1492 ; 
comment Européens, Africains, et Américains ont réagi entre 
eux ; et les résultats immédiats de leur contact.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina a mistura rica das sociedades que 
coexistem no mundo novo antes de Europeus chegou. Olha o que se 
realizava a vida como aqui antes de 1492; como Europeus, os 
africanos, e os americanos se reagiram; e os resultados 
imediatos de seu contato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esamina la miscela ricca delle società che 
coesistono nel nuovo mondo prima di Europei è arrivato. Guarda 
che cosa aveva luogo la vita come qui prima di 1492; come 
Europei, gli Africani e gli Americani hanno reagito l'un l'altro; 
ed i risultati immediati del loro contatto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει το πλούσιο μίγμα των κοινωνιών που 
συνυπάρχουν στο νέο κόσμο προτού να φθάσουν οι Ευρωπαίοι. 
Εξετάζει αυτό που ήταν ζωή όπως εδώ πριν από 1492  
πώς οι Ευρωπαίοι, Αφρικανοί, και Αμερικανοί αντέδρασαν ο 
ένας στον άλλο  και τα άμεσα αποτελέσματα της επαφής τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina la mezcla rica de las sociedades que 
coexisten en el mundo nuevo antes de europeos llegó. Mira como 
cuál era la vida aquí antes de 1492; cómo europeos, los 
africanos, y los americanos reaccionaron el uno al otro; y los 
resultados inmediatos de su contacto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206349</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108750</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/1492-an-ongoing-voyage</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
